page.title: 11MY DAY, BY KATHRYN AGED 13
page.content: My name's Kathryn, and I'm 13 yrs old. Weekdays, I have to get up at 7:15am. Then I go down stairs and have my breakfast at 7:30am. Then quickly get washed and dressed for 8:00am, setting off for school at 8:15am, and arriving by 8:45. The school bell rings at 8:55am. After registration and assembly, lessons begin at 9:20am. School finishes at 3:30pm. I get home at about 3:50pm.I usually help make the tea and have it about 5:00 to 5:30pm. I then do my homework at about 6:00pm, if any. I usually go to my friends, or go to the local youth club. I have to be home at about 9:00pm. I have supper,and then get washed, and remember to brush my teeth.I sometimes read in bed before I go to sleep.
